name: VNImageRequestHandler
desc: An object that processes one or more image analysis requests pertaining to a single image.

items.name: init(cgImage: CGImage, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a handler to be used for performing requests on Core Graphics images.

items.name: init(cgImage: CGImage, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a handler to be used for performing requests on a Core Graphics image with known orientation.

items.name: init(ciImage: CIImage, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a handler to be used for performing requests on CIImage data.

items.name: init(ciImage: CIImage, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a handler to be used for performing requests on CIImage data of a known orientation.

items.name: init(cvPixelBuffer: CVPixelBuffer, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a handler to be used for performing requests on a Core Video pixel buffer.

items.name: init(cvPixelBuffer: CVPixelBuffer, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a handler to be used for performing requests on a Core Video pixel buffer of a known orientation.

items.name: init(cmSampleBuffer: CMSampleBuffer, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a request handler that performs requests on an image contained within a sample buffer.

items.name: init(cmSampleBuffer: CMSampleBuffer, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a request handler that performs requests on an image of a specified orientation contained within a sample buffer.

items.name: init(data: Data, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a handler to be used for performing requests on an image contained in an NSData object.

items.name: init(data: Data, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a handler to be used for performing requests on an image of known orientation, contained in an NSData object.

items.name: init(url: URL, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a handler to be used for performing requests on an image at the specified URL.

items.name: init(url: URL, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, options: [VNImageOption : Any])
items.desc: Creates a handler to be used for performing requests on an image with known orientation, at the specified URL.

items.name: func perform([VNRequest])
items.desc: Schedules Vision requests to be performed.

items.name: struct VNImageOption
items.desc: An option key passed into VNImageRequestHandler creations or requests that take an auxiliary image.
